Unique number identifying the order: Unique number identifying the customer on a platform
For this competition limited to bikes, however in practice Sendy service extends to trucks and vans
Platform used to place the order, there are 4 types
Customer type
Placement - Day of Month i.e 1-31
Placement - Weekday (Monday = 1)
Placement - Time - Time of day the order was placed
Confirmation - Day of Month i.e 1-31
Confirmation - Weekday (Monday = 1)
Confirmation - Time - Time of day the order was confirmed by a rider

Order No: Arrival at Pickup - Day of Month
Unique number identifying the order: Arrival at Pickup - Day of Month i.e 1-31
Arrival at Pickup - Weekday (Monday = 1)
Time of day the the rider arrived at the location to pick up the order - as marked by the rider through the Sendy application
Pickup - Day of Month i.e 1-31
Pickup - Weekday (Monday = 1)
Pickup - Time - Time of day the the rider picked up the order - as marked by the rider through the Sendy application

Order No: Arrival at Destination - Day of Month
Unique number identifying the order: Arrival at Delivery - Day of Month i.e 1-31
Arrival at Delivery - Weekday (Monday = 1)
Arrival at Delivery Time - Time of day the rider arrived at the destination to deliver the order - as marked by the rider through the Sendy application
The distance from Pickup to Destination
Temperature at the time of order placement in Degrees Celsius (measured every three hours)
Precipitation at the time of order placement (measured every three hours)
Latitude of pick up location
Longitude of pick up location
Latitude of delivery location
Longitude of delivery location
ID of the Rider who accepted the order
Time in seconds between 'Pickup' and 'Arrival at Destination' - calculated from the columns for the purpose of facilitating the task
Unique number identifying the rider (same as in order details)
Number of Orders the rider has delivered
Number of days since the rider delivered the first order
Average rating of the rider
Number of ratings the rider has received. Rating an order is optional for the customer.
